value.name: Las Vegas police officers won’t face charges for killing Jorge Gomez
value.description: The armed protester was shot and killed last year on the third straight night of major demonstrations in Las Vegas prompted by the May 2020 murder of George Floyd.

value.name: Clark County DA will not charge cops that killed Jorge Gomez after Las Vegas protests
value.description: The cops involved in the deadly shooting of Jorge Gomez following Las Vegas racial justice protests will not face any charges.

value.name: Clark County D.A. declines to charge officers who shot, killed Jorge Gomez
value.description: The Clark County District Attorney's office will not charge the four Las Vegas police officers who shot and killed Jorge Gomez in June last year, concluding their actions were "reasonable and/or legally justified.

value.name: Historic Nevada State Prison in Carson City to offer tours Memorial Day weekend and June 5
value.description: The storied Nevada State Prison in Carson City will be open for public tours this weekend. You'll be regaled with tales of prisoners past and hear the stories of the only prison ever to allow gambling inside the walls.

value.name: FINAL DECISION: No charges against Las Vegas police officers who killed Jorge Gomez
value.description: The Clark County District Attorney’s Office has decided that it will not pursue criminal charges against the four police officers who shot and killed Jorge Gomez during a Black Lives Matter protest in downtown Las Vegas.

value.name: Rally being held for Jorge Gomez tomorrow at 8
value.description: A rally is being held for Jorge Gomez, the man who died during a confrontation with law enforcement in June. The rally is happening tomorrow morning at 8 outside the Clark County Government Center.
